I feel like a lot has changed 😓. the app is alright but some "features" are just awful... especially the channels 😕, I'm sick of being told to ignore them. also the curation is trashy, for one it's biased, none of the suggestions call out to me, and several are actually inappropriate... and all I can do is hide them...😓 only for them to appear AGAIN. surely 😕. and don't get me started on the meta AI... it's awful

This issue has now exceeded one month without resolution. WhatsApp continues to override my custom notification settings and revert them to the default tone automatically, without any user input. This is a systemic application fault, not a device or configuration issue. It has been reported multiple times and has not been addressed. The continued lack of action is unacceptable. I require immediate remediation, confirmation that this defect is acknowledged, and a specific timeline for when a pe

Wahh, terimakasih banyak developer.. Kemajuan fitur fitur WhatsApp benar benar bagus dan berjalan cukup baik! Banyak dari usulan saya di tahun tahun lalu yang sudah ada. Sedikit saran dari saya untuk diadakan pemilihan wallpaper dan tema berwarna (merah, ungu, hijau, dsb.) secara bebas pada channel, wallpaper ini dipilih oleh pembuat channel dan wallpapernya akan terlihat sama dari pov para followers. Sehingga hal ini bisa meningkatkan suasana khas pada setiap channel yang ada. Terimakasih.
So may bugs.. Wrong profile pictures per chat, chats split into duplicates just to name a few. Along with meta ai almost makes this app redundant

What's app has been a good app so far...but since the new Version things aren't so interesting....I prefer the old layout for status updates I could see the content partly but now it's horizontal and you can only see the contacts DP and not the status until you tap on it It's no longer exciting to view statuses

The thing left for WhatsApp to do is to be able to have a seperate tab from chats and groups.. Like we have tabs for group, favorite, unread etc.. WE SHOULD BE ABLE TO CROP VIDEOS B4 WE POST ON ANDROID. THIS FEATURE IS AVAILABLE ON THE IOS WHATSAPP, WE WANT IT ON THE ANDROID OS. Thank you

I want WhatsApp to improve a feature. Currently, when a chat is locked and locked contact posts a status, it still appears in the main status section. By clicking it, the app navigates to the locked chat area, which can be accessed if someone knows the phone password or uses a fingerprint. The status of locked chats should only appear inside the locked section, not in the main status list..

These guys do updates on the app all the time, but we still don't have versatility with chat backups and restoration! You have to uninstall and reinstall to restore - stupid! Then every backup replaces the previous one and you cannot do more than one backup - stupid! And there's no portability between Whatsapp and Whatsapp Business! Stupid! I'm also sick of the number confirmation BS that you have to repeat hundreds of times before it works!

Dear WhatsApp Team, My account has been banned due to “spam”, but this seems to be a misunderstanding. I have never engaged in any spam, automated activity, bulk messaging, or any behavior that violates WhatsApp’s Terms of Service. I use this number only for personal communication with family and friends. This ban has caused me great inconvenience. I respectfully request you to kindly review my account again and restore access. I assure you that I will always follow all WhatsApp policies. Thank
